scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.postpublish: aws s3 cp dist/stratumn-sdk.js s3://stratumn-libs/stratumn-sdk.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/stratumn-sdk.min.js s3://stratumn-libs/stratumn-sdk.min.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/stratumn-sdk.js s3://stratumn-libs/stratumn-sdk-${npm_package_version}.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/stratumn-sdk.min.js s3://stratumn-libs/stratumn-sdk-${npm_package_version}.min.js --region 'eu-west-1'
